alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 2:14PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, Gulf, southeastern Bay and Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, western Gadsden, Liberty and west central Franklin Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 245 PM EDT/145 PM CDT/... At 214 PM EDT/114 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Greensboro to 6 miles south of Blountstown to 6 miles southwest of Mexico Beach. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Callaway, Blountstown, Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Greensboro, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Chattahoochee, Orange, Parker, Wewahitchka, Bristol, Altha, Rock Bluff, Honeyville, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Selman and Abe Springs. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; Coastal Gulf; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf; Jackson; Liberty
